title: Ticket #1406: Processor Affinity setting doesn't work with privset
description: Processor Affinity setting is done in DaemonCore::Create_Process, which privsep doesn't use. So, if you have privsep on, processor affinity doesn't work.
remarks: Fixed in 7.4.3. Note that glexec doesn't support processor affinity, so it doesn't work it that world, only with the condor switchboard.
check_ins: 2010-May-19 15:11   Check-in [18207]: Add processor affinity support for privsep #1406 We now only set the processor affinity for the switchboard process, which should be inherited down to the user job. Note that priv sep isn't implememented on Windows, so neither is processor affinity + privsep (By Greg Thain )
